name: DRAGON’S EYE
description: And so the Dragon gazed upon his world
effect: As a protocol, you may enhance your sensor suite. If you do, you become Immobilized until the start of your next turn, but increase your sensors by 10 for the same duration.

name: DRAGON’S SCALES
description: And saw his armor dented, but unbroken
effect: Your mech is immune to all environmental heat and burn effects.

name: DRAGON’S ADAPTATION
description: Knowing he must change, or be changed, he spoke to his followers,
effect: Whenever you print your mech, choose one of the following stats: Speed, e-Defense, Evasion, Sensor Range, Heat Capacity, Repair Capacity, Save Target. Increase that stat by 1 until you next reprint your mech.

name: DRAGON’S HOARD
description: Gather! Gather your men, your mechs, your money! Gather arms and armor, my followers,
effect: Your Mech gains 2 additional SP that must be spent on Limited systems.

name: DRAGON’S CRUSADE
description: For when the Darkness comes again, we will stand ready for the Crusade!
effect: Whenever you roll a STRUCTURE or OVERHEATING check, you may skrimish as a reaction before the effects of the check are applied.
